attributes.title: HE GAVE ME CORONA VIRUS😭😭😭😭😡😡😡😡😡🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬
attributes.review:
first1️⃣ of all, this app took 69♋️ years to download.💔💔💔💔 i am extremely disappointed💔 in this, because my dear president✨is known for quick wifi😩💫✨
second2️⃣of all, here is my story of what happened and how i got corona virus 🦠from my wonderful president two weeks☀️🌧🌚🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭
i woke up and was looking through my republican app store when i saw tr*mp 2020!!!!!!! i was so happy😁😁😁😁😁😁😁 so i downloaded it, but it took 69♋️ years to download!!!💔😡 so i waited because i love him so much. so after it downloaded, i went on it, and the whole screen was orange 🍊!!!!!!!!!! i do love the color because it’s the presidents skin color, but i don’t want it on my phone🤬🤬 only on president✨✨✨so i restarted my phone because it didn’t go away!!!😢 but i finally got it back on▶️and then on the screen 📺 was a portal looking 👁 thing!! i didn’t know what it was so i just kept my phone 📱 on and went to make lunch 🥗 in the other room! but when i came back, LOVE OF MY LIFE PRESIDENT WAS HERE!!!😍😍😍😍😍😍😍🥰🥰🥰😘😘😘😘😘😍😍✨✨✨✨✨✨💕💕💕💕💕💖💖❣️💕💓🖤💞💓💗but then he coughed on me😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡 i got so mad because maybe i got corona virus 🦠!!!!!!!!😭😭😭😭🤬🤬🤬😡😡 so i slapped him and he went back inside the phone and left orange 🍊 residue everywhere!!! my phone was orange 🍊 again!!💔💔💔💔but then i went to get tested for corona virus 🦠 and tested POSITIVE ⭕️😡😡😡🤬🤬😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭🤬🤬🤬😡😡😡😡😡😡i was in the hospital 🏥 for so long!!! and i CANT BELIEVE MY WONDERFUL 💗PRESIDENT✨✨ WOULD DO THAT TO ME😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😡😡😡🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬😡 i cant believe this😭😭😭😡😡😡🤬🤬🤬but then after a week i got better!!😁😁😁😁😁🥰🥰🥰i went home 🏠 and then gave the app one last try and then IT HAPPENED AGAIN!!!!!🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬i got corona virus 🦠 TWICE🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬😡😡😡😡😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭 but this time he slapped me into the phone📱 with him!!!!😭😭🤬🤬😡so i went to the white 🤍 house 🏠 and then i got arrested👮 for nothing💔💔💔💔💔 i’m in prison writing this🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🥺🥺🥺🥺🥺😡😡😭😭😭😭😭😭😭 thank you for reading🤬🤬🤬
